I am a master graduate student in [Weill Cornell Graduate School of Medical Sciences](https://gradschool.weill.cornell.edu) at [Cornell University](https://www.cornell.edu), majoring in Biostatistics and Data Science. I obtained a BS degree with 1st class honor in Statistics from [School of Science and Engineering](https://sse.cuhk.edu.cn/en) at [Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen](https://www.cuhk.edu.cn/en) in 2019. 

I was an undergraduate research assistant in [Shenzhen Research Institute of Big Data](http://www.sribd.cn/index.php/en) under the supervise of Dr.Jianjun Zhou and [Dr.Jianmin Jia](https://myweb.cuhk.edu.cn/jmjia), participating in two projects in Learning Analytics and Trajectory Network Analysis. My current interest is application of data mining and statistical modeling methods in health care related field.

My full resume is available [here](files/Kai_resume.pdf)
